summary: The customer asked for help understanding the payment process for Contoso Wireless internet service. The agent explained that customers can choose either a one-time fee or a monthly payment option. The one-time fee varies depending on the package selected, and the monthly payments are set amounts. Other services offered by Contoso Wireless include phone plans, TV packages, and add-on features. All payments are due on the same day each month, and autopay options are available.
